"Dualdre": "...Mm? Doesn't look like your Class is Bouncer."
"Gonna have to get you to sign up as a Bouncer at the Class Counter first. Gets the formalities out of the way, y'know?"
"While you're there, give Bouncer's Class Skills a good looking-over. Commit 'em to memory."
"But hey, I might as well tell you what the Class is all about while you're here."
"Bouncers are a Class geared toward excelling at short- to mid-range combat."
"We're especially good at aerial combat, using our weapons and Techniques to float like a butterfly, sting like a bee."
"We're also good at triggering Physical Downs and Attribute Downs to swing battles in our favor."
"Just like any other class, Class Skills are your bread and butter. First, you should master \"Elemental Decline\"."
"I'll give you this assignment for now, so go try it out."
